attributes.action: have a vote of no confidance Mr Gordon Brown and his government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PM Gordon Brown and his government have lost the confidence of the British people. A vote of no confidance in him and his government after a stream of recent diaster's, for example the Northern Rock fiasco with tax payers money, HM Revenue & Customs losing our confidential information,the whole asylum / immigration issue and more recently party funding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
